title: Where Plants Grow
description: Where Plants Grow is an informational book that explains the different conditions under which plants can grow. The familiar topic, repeated text, and picture-to-text correspondence make this an easy book for early readers.
meta: air, inside, outside, plants, pots, rocks, sand, soil, sunlight, water
